# Gift Card Reports

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/gift-card-reports/

## Category
06 Gift Cards And Packages

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
REPORTS
Gift Card Reports
IN THIS ARTICLE
Gift Card Usage Report
Gift Card Balances Report
Gift Card Sales Report

If the Gift Cards app is enabled for your account, the following Gift Card reports are available in the Reports app.

Gift Card reports can help you track the number of gift cards sold, outstanding gift card balances, and more.

Link copied
Gift Card Usage Report

The Gift Card Usage report includes gift card usage details, including reversed gift card payments.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Gift Card Usage report.

Column

	

Description




Date

	

The date the gift card was used.




Sale #

	

The sale where the gift card was used.




Gift Card #

	

The gift card number.




Last Sale Date

	

The date the gift card was sold. Gift cards with no date include gift cards that were added manually.




Amount

	

The gift card amount that was used.




Service Staff Member(s)

	

The staff member who completed the service.

Link copied
Gift Card Balances Report

The Gift Card Balances report includes outstanding gift card balances at the end of the selected day. Download the Excel report to see any notes added for each gift card.

When a gift card payment is reversed, the updated gift card balance appears in this report immediately.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Gift Card Balances report.

Column

	

Description




Gift Card #

	

The gift card number.




Purchaser

	

The client who purchased the gift card.




Owner

	

The client who owns the gift card.




Amount

	

The gift card balance.

Link copied
Gift Card Sales Report

The Gift Card Sales report includes quantities and sales totals of gift cards.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Gift Card Sales report.

Column

	

Description




# Gift Cards

	

The number of gift cards sold.




Adjustments

	

The adjustments that were made to the default price during checkout.




Sales

	

The gift card sales total.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
